actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 94-131.

official_title: Submission of a resolution relating to expenses of the committee on Appropriations.

summary.text: (Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 94-131) Authorizes the Senate Appropriations Committee to expend sums it deems appropriate, within its appropriation for inquiries and investigations, for procurement of services of individual consultants or organizations. Requires that if such services are procured by contract that such contract be made in the same manner and subject to the same conditions regarding advertising as are required of other standing committees.

titles.title: Submission of a resolution relating to expenses of the committee on Appropriations.
